title: Andy Makes Ramen Two Ways | From the Test Kitchen | Bon Appétit
description:
Springy ramen noodles and a cilantro-miso sauce bring a welcome twist to a classic pesto recipe. And the noodles are just a vessel for the savory, gingery, simple weeknight sauce.

Get the recipes!

Ginger Scallion Ramen Noodles: https://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/ginger-scallion-ramen-noodles
